greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(p^n)=p^(n+1)(p-1) if p is prime and a(nm)=lcm(a(n),a(m)) if gcd(n,m)=1.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: fa=FactorInteger; lam[p_, s_] := p^(s + 1)(p - 1); lam[1] = 1; lam[n_] := {aux = 1; Do[aux = LCM[aux, lam[fa[n][[i,1]], fa[n][[i, 2]]]], {i, 1, Length[fa[n]]}]; aux}[[1]];Array[lam,100]
program: a236563 n = foldl lcm 1 $ zipWith (\p e -> p ^ (e + 1) * (p - 1))
results.author: _José María Grau Ribas_, Feb 22 2014
